name: .300 AAC Blackout
description: .300 AAC Blackout is an intermediate cartridge that achieves ballistics similar to the 7.62x39 but allows use on the AR-15 platform.  The round is necked-up from the 5.56mm NATO, but feeds from a STANAG magazine.  It requires a specific barrel, so will not work in a standard M4 or similar carbine.  This loading is supersonic.
